concept.title: 5647.402-9000 Flight Service Contract Distribution and Reporting.

conbody.p: (a) Whenever flight services are procured from an USAF Air Mobility Command (AMC) approved carrier (FAA 135 carriers), a copy of the contract must be forwarded to: HQ AMC/A3BS, 402 Scott Drive, Unit 3A1, Scott AFB, IL 62225-5302. The point of contacts are the AMC Transportation Assistants, at DSN 779-4801. If EDA distribution is utilized, provide an e-mail notice of the contract posting to the EDA site.
